Texts.Chs: 随着社会在海底深处发展，我们的注意力被吸引到了海面上。这不仅仅是为了获取资源，更是出于探索的欲望。正是在那时，我们第一次发现了恒星与它们一起……我们拥有梦想的能力。
Texts.Eng: As society evolved deep below the seas, our attention was drawn to the surface. Not just to claim resources but out of desire for exploration, and it is then then we first discovered the stars and with them...our ability to dream.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者起源于Norkumsgath，这是一个海洋世界，气候与现在被摧毁的地球相似。我们的祖先是海洋中的顶级捕食者，我们以群体为基础的狩猎策略加快了社会的发展。
Texts.Eng: The Skath originated on Norkumsgath, an ocean world with climate similar to that of the now destroyed Earth. Our ancestors were the apex predators within the oceans and our pack-based hunting strategies quickly led to the development of a society.

Texts.Chs: 人类最早的记录刻在Tethys山谷的石头上，这个地区一直远离海洋，离内陆很远。日期表明，过去三万年大约是斯卡斯首次成为两栖动物的时间。根据收集的样本，他们的饮食主要以肉类为主。
Texts.Eng: The first records of our kind were carved in stone in the Tethys Valley, in a region that has always been well inland from the seas. Dating suggests thirty thousand years in the past was approximately the time when Skath first became amphibious. Based on the collected samples, they had a primarily meat-based diet.
